1. Aries - 7/10 - A natural-born leader, Aries excel at making bold decisions and taking charge.
2. Taurus - 4/10 - Practical and cautious, Tauruses are not typically known for their spontaneity or willingness to take risks.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis have a natural talent for thinking on their feet and making last-minute decisions.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Emotional and nurturing, Cancers tend to be more cautious and hesitant when it comes to taking financial risks.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos are naturally drawn to opportunities that allow them to shine and take center stage.
6. Virgo - 3/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, Virgos are often risk-averse and prefer to play it safe when it comes to finances.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Social and diplomatic, Librans have a natural ability to balance different perspectives and make informed decisions.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios are not afraid to take calculated risks and can be masterful at making financial moves.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians have a natural inclination towards taking bold steps and exploring new opportunities.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Responsible and disciplined, Capricorns are often cautious when it comes to finances but can be persuaded to take calculated risks if the stakes are high enough.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians have a natural ability to think outside the box and make unconventional decisions.
12. Pisces - 2/10 - Dreamy and empathetic, Pisces tend to be more cautious and hesitant when it comes to taking financial risks due to their emotional connection to money.
